00101 inline const i2d::CVector2d& CPolygon::GetNode(int index) const
00102 {
00103        I_ASSERT(index >= 0 && index < int(m_nodes.size()));
00104 
00105        return m_nodes[index];
00106 }

00109 inline void CPolygon::SetNode(int index, const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00110 {

00113        m_nodes[index] = node;
